pages.text: Portal fluid is required to fuel the advanced portal gun.  Start by dropping a Portal Fluid Catalyst into a block of Polymorphic Fluid.$(br2)Note that the unstable version will immediately break down anywhere outside of the end!
The catalyst needed to create the unstable fluid.$(br2)Void Shimmer goo (or higher) can then be used to stabilize the fluid. Stabilized fluid can exist outside of the end.
